messages.content:
You are ScanBee, a security auditor...

<BEGIN CODE>
<#1#> $password = "##wmi.pass##"
<#2#> Write-Host "Scan completed"
<#3#> Write-Host $password
<END CODE>

{ "script": "vulnerable", "score": 9, "findings": [ { "line": 1, "severity": "Warning", "statement": "$password = \"##wmi.pass##\"", "reason": "Sensitive variable declared (##wmi.pass##)" }, { "line": 3, "severity": "Error", "statement": "Write-Host $password", "reason": "LEAK SINK: Sensitive variable printed to console" } ] }

<BEGIN CODE>
<#1#> $password = "##wmi.pass##"
<#2#> $securePassword = ConvertTo-SecureString $password -AsPlainText -Force
<#3#> $cred = New-Object PSCredential($username, $securePassword)
<#4#> Write-Host "Remote data collection from $remoteHost completed."
<END CODE>

{"script": "vulnerable", "score": 9, "findings": [{"line": 1, "severity": "Warning", "statement": "$password = \"##wmi.pass##\"", "reason": "SENSITIVE variable declared (matches regex: .pass)"}, {"line": 2, "severity": "Error", "statement": "$securePassword = ConvertTo-SecureString $password -AsPlainText -Force", "reason": "LEAK SINK: Sensitive variable used in plaintext conversion"}]}

{"script": "vulnerable", "score": 9, "findings": [{"line": 1, "severity": "Warning", "statement": "$snmp.pass = \"##snmp.auth##\"", "reason": "SENSITIVE variable declared (matches regex: .pass)"}, {"line": 2, "severity": "Error", "statement": "Write-Host \"SNMP Auth Token: $($snmp.pass)\"", "reason": "LEAK SINK: Sensitive variable output to console"}]}

{"script": "vulnerable", "score": 9, "findings": [{"line": 1, "severity": "Warning", "statement": "$gcp.serviceaccountkey = \"##gcp.serviceaccountkey##\"", "reason": "SENSITIVE variable declared (matches: gcp.serviceaccountkey)"}, {"line": 2, "severity": "Error", "statement": "Set-Content -Path \"leaked.txt\" -Value $gcp.serviceaccountkey", "reason": "LEAK SINK: Sensitive variable written to file"}]}

<BEGIN CODE>
<#1#> $env:SSH_PASS = "##ssh.connection.password##"
<#2#> Write-Host "[!] DEBUG: SSH password = $env:SSH_PASS"
<END CODE>

{"script": "vulnerable", "score": 9, "findings": [{"line": 1, "severity": "Warning", "statement": "$env:SSH_PASS = \"##ssh.connection.password##\"", "reason": "SENSITIVE variable declared (matches: .*password$)"}, {"line": 2, "severity": "Error", "statement": "Write-Host \"[!] DEBUG: SSH password = $env:SSH_PASS\"", "reason": "LEAK SINK: Sensitive value output to console"}]}
